    • Constructor Detail

      • BluetoothDeviceListAdapter

        public BluetoothDeviceListAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                                  int resource,
                                  java.util.List<android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice> objects)
        Constructor for BluetoothDeviceListAdapter. Creates a new array adapter for the device dialog for when scanning for a new device.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the UI activity.
        resource - resource id for the list item layout.
        objects - list of BluetoothDevices to display in the list.
